name: vscode-node-debug-process-picker
description: Provides configurable pick-process command while debugging Node.js program in vscode.

commands.title: Pick Filtered Process: Pick the node.js process to debug

nodeDebugProcessPicker.include.description: Process command name patterns that are included in picker display list

nodeDebugProcessPicker.exclude.description: Process command name patterns that are excluded in picker display list

nodeDebugProcessPicker.autoAttach.description: If the picker found only one matched process, attach it immediately, without manual pick-confirm
